trans-unit.source: Enables you to pass context properties from the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: Consente di passare le proprietà di contesto da COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) nel contesto COM+.

trans-unit.source: COMTI provides services for accessing the IBM Customer Information Control System (CICS) and IBM Information Management System (IMS).
trans-unit.target: COMTI fornisce servizi per l'accesso al sistema di controllo informazioni (CICS) di IBM cliente e IBM informazioni sistema IMS (Management).

trans-unit.source: Essentially, COMTI provides a set of tools and services that ease the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
trans-unit.target: Essenzialmente, COMTI fornisce un set di strumenti e servizi che semplifica il wrapping di transazioni mainframe e logica di business come componenti COM.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'utilizzo degli attributi, vedere [attributi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"> </xref> (classe), l'impostazione di <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, enabling the setting of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"> </xref> (classe), attivando l'impostazione della <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>proprietà.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le proprietà di contesto COMTI vengono passate in contesto COM+; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) context properties are passed into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se le proprietà di contesto COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) vengono passate in contesto COM+.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le proprietà di contesto COMTI vengono passate in contesto COM+; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
